products.title: Sony K77XR80PU 77 Inch BRAVIA 8 XR80PU 4K OLED TV and PS5 with Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Game Bundle
products.body_html:
Sony K77XR80PU 77 Inch BRAVIA 8 4K OLED TV and PlayStation 5 with Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Game Bundle

This Bundle includes:

  • Sony K77XR80PU 77 Inch BRAVIA 8 XR80PU 4K OLED Smart Google Bravia TV 2024
  • Sony PlayStation 5 Console Call Of Duty Black Ops 6 Bundle


Overview

The Sony K77XR80PU 77 Inch BRAVIA 8 4K OLED Smart TV and PlayStation 5 Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Bundle offer a premium entertainment experience. The 77-inch OLED TV boasts 4K resolution, 8 million self-illuminating pixels, XR Contrast Booster, and XR TRILUMINOS Pro for vibrant, lifelike visuals. Acoustic Surface Audio+ and Dolby Atmos provide immersive sound. Ideal for gamers, it supports 4K/120fps, VRR, and PS5 features. The PlayStation 5 Slim delivers ultra-fast SSD performance, stunning 8K graphics, and smooth gameplay up to 120fps. It includes Call of Duty Black Ops 6 for endless action. The bundle’s DualSense controller offers enhanced immersion, while voice search and Google TV add convenience.

Sony K77XR80PU 77 Inch BRAVIA 8 XR80PU 4K OLED Smart Google Bravia TV 2024

The Sony K77XR80PU 77 Inch BRAVIA 8 XR80PU 4K OLED Smart Google TV delivers a premium cinematic experience, ideal for gamers and movie lovers alike. With 4K OLED resolution, this TV features 8 million self-illuminating pixels for deep blacks, bright whites, and stunning color gradation. XR Contrast Booster and XR TRILUMINOS Pro enhance depth, contrast, and color accuracy for lifelike visuals. Acoustic Surface Audio+ technology turns the screen into a speaker, offering immersive sound, while Dolby Atmos and 360 Spatial Sound Mapping create a dynamic audio experience.

Perfect for gaming, it supports 4K/120fps, VRR, ALLM, and PS5 features for smooth, responsive gameplay. Google TV provides access to over 700,000 movies and TV episodes, including top streaming services, while voice search and YouView catch-up bring added convenience. With its sleek One Slate design and Eco Remote, this TV complements any room while offering cutting-edge tech for an unmatched viewing experience.

Sony PlayStation 5 Console Call Of Duty Black Ops 6 Bundle

Experience next-level gaming with the Sony PlayStation 5 Slim Console with Call of Duty Black Ops 6 package, a perfect combination of power and immersion. The PS5 Slim features an ultra-high-speed SSD for near-instant loading, a custom CPU and GPU for seamless performance, and stunning ray-tracing technology for lifelike graphics. Enjoy visuals in breathtaking 8K resolution and HDR for vivid, vibrant colors, while frame rates of up to 120fps deliver smooth gameplay on compatible 4K displays. The bundle includes the action-packed Call of Duty Black Ops 6, ensuring endless hours of entertainment. Equipped with an optical drive, the PS5 supports both physical discs and digital downloads, offering versatile gaming options. The immersive Tempest 3D AudioTech brings soundscapes to life, while the DualSense wireless controller elevates interaction with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for ultimate realism. Compact in design yet loaded with features, this bundle is your gateway to a truly groundbreaking gaming experience. (Vertical stand sold separately.)

Overview

Upgrade your entertainment and gaming setup with the Sony KD50X75WLPU 50 Inch X75WL LED 4K TV and PlayStation 5 Call of Duty Black Ops 6 Bundle. The BRAVIA TV features a 4K Processor X1 for stunning visuals, Dolby Vision, HDR10, and Motionflow XR for smooth, detailed gameplay and cinema-quality entertainment. Its X-Balanced speakers and Dolby Atmos deliver immersive sound, while Google TV offers access to over 700,000 shows and apps with voice control via Google Assistant, Alexa, or AirPlay. The PS5 Slim delivers ultra-fast loading, ray tracing, 8K support, and 120fps performance, paired with Tempest 3D AudioTech and a DualSense controller. The bundle includes Call of Duty Black Ops 6, offering an exceptional gaming experience.

Powered by the 4K Processor X1, this TV delivers stunningly realistic visuals with vivid colors, natural brightness, and exceptional detail. Dolby Vision and HDR10 enhance gaming and movie experiences by optimizing contrast and picture depth.

Gamers will love the new gaming menu, which offers seamless access to settings and assist functions. Paired with a PS5, enjoy features like Auto HDR Tone Mapping and Auto Genre Picture Mode for perfect visuals. Motionflow XR ensures smooth, blur-free action for immersive gameplay.

Audio clarity meets sleek design with X-Balanced speakers, while Dolby Atmos support brings cinematic sound. With Google TV, access over 700,000 shows, 10,000 apps, and top streaming services. Plus, enjoy hands-free control with Google Assistant, Alexa, or Apple AirPlay. Upgrade your gaming and entertainment with Sony's premium BRAVIA tech!

Enjoy visuals in breathtaking 8K resolution and HDR for vivid, vibrant colors, while frame rates of up to 120fps deliver smooth gameplay on compatible 4K displays. The bundle includes the action-packed Call of Duty Black Ops 6, ensuring endless hours of entertainment. Equipped with an optical drive, the PS5 supports both physical discs and digital downloads, offering versatile gaming options. The immersive Tempest 3D AudioTech brings soundscapes to life, while the DualSense wireless controller elevates interaction with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for ultimate realism.
